messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 15 Days Plus package.
What does the 15 Days Plus package include?
Can you tell me what is offered in the 15 Days Plus package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor 15 Days Plus package?

The 15 Days Plus package provides 5 GB of internet, 3500 Telenor minutes, 200 minutes on other networks, and 3500 SMS for 15 days. It is priced at Rs. 350 including tax and is available through easypaisa.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 15 Days Plus package.
How can I activate the 15 Days Plus package?
What is the method to subscribe to the 15 Days Plus package?
How do I get the 15 Days Plus package?
The 15 Days Plus package can be subscribed to exclusively through the easypaisa application.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 15 Days Plus package.
Who is eligible for the 15 Days Plus package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the 15 Days Plus package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the 15 Days Plus package?
All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the 15 Days Plus package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 15 Days Plus package.
How long is the 15 Days Plus package valid?
What is the validity period of the 15 Days Plus package?
For how many days does the 15 Days Plus package remain active?
The 15 Days Plus package is valid for 15 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
